Text.Page:
The battle for the Khanovar Front extends below the surface—and that's where we're sending you.

{@LinkCreature:248#3007#Brumbar} guards the teleportal to the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.

Use that and report to {@LinkCreature:418#2001#Baruster} and he’ll give you your orders.

We don't get a lot of volunteers, Shariar or otherwise.

Our mission's simple: kill argons and recover their plating. We recycle it into armor or siege weapons.

Simple enough. Get killing.

As my castanic friends say, there's no dross in you!

Glad to see we've got someone who can really fight. Nice job in the catacombs, .

Watch out for argons!

They can sneak up before you're ready! Stay sharp.
